name: stormkit
description: Stormkit is a serverless hosting and CI/CD platform for front-end apps with a management dashboard and API. The core service is SaaS; the repo provides app configuration and tooling.
features: Serverless hosting: Deploys front-end applications to serverless infrastructure.
Git integration: Connects to GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket repositories.
Automatic deployments: Triggers builds on git push or pull requests.
Preview environments: Creates temporary environments for each pull request.
Custom domains: Configures custom domains with automatic SSL certificates.
Environment variables: Manages secrets and config per environment.
Build optimization: Optimizes builds for performance and size.
CDN distribution: Serves static assets via global CDN.
Analytics: Tracks deployment metrics and visitor statistics.
Team collaboration: Manages projects with team members and permissions.
Rollback support: Reverts to previous deployments with one click.
API access: Automates deployments via REST API.
